duties_responsibilities.duty: Explain, promote, sell and/or refer bank products and services to clients
Meet assigned monthly/quarterly sales and referral goals
Conduct telemarketing and follow-up sales duties when assigned by management
Understand and accurately communicate deposit products
Reconcile cash and all other transactions each day
Stay informed of job-related issues, promotions, changes, policies, or procedures
Stay current on business-related activities in other areas of the Bank

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED required; College degree preferred
